languages.text: Первичное сканирование показало катастрофическое изменение атмосферы планеты и значительные разрушения инфраструктуры на ее поверхности, а также наличие вражеских кораблей. Необходимо немедленно провести разведку и узнать обстановку на Веабос-6.

Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.
languages.original_text: Первичное сканирование показало катастрофическое изменение атмосферы планеты и значительные разрушения инфраструктуры на ее поверхности, а также наличие вражеских кораблей. Необходимо немедленно провести разведку и узнать обстановку на Веабос-6.

traits.locale_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos-VI.

Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos-VI.

Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos-VI.

Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

languages.text: 初步扫描显示，这颗行星的大气层发生了灾难性的变化。行星表面基础设施遭到破坏，而且还扫描到了敌方舰船的存在。必须立刻对维博斯六号星进行侦查，确定这里的情况。
languages.original_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: 初步扫描显示，这颗行星的大气层发生了灾难性的变化。行星表面基础设施遭到破坏，而且还扫描到了敌方舰船的存在。必须立刻对维博斯六号星进行侦查，确定这里的情况。

languages.text: 準備段階のスキャンで惑星の大気の壊滅的な変化と地表のインフラの荒廃が明らかになり、敵船舶の存在も検知された。ヴィアボス・VIの状況を確認するために、直ちに偵察を実施する必要がある。
languages.original_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: 準備段階のスキャンで惑星の大気の壊滅的な変化と地表のインフラの荒廃が明らかになり、敵船舶の存在も検知された。ヴィアボス・VIの状況を確認するために、直ちに偵察を実施する必要がある。

languages.text: Los escaneos preliminares han revelado un cambio catastrófico en la atmósfera del planeta y la devastación de la infraestructura de su superficie, así como la presencia de naves enemigas. Es necesario realizar un reconocimiento de inmediato para confirmar la situación de Vheabos VI.
languages.original_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: Los escaneos preliminares han revelado un cambio catastrófico en la atmósfera del planeta y la devastación de la infraestructura de su superficie, así como la presencia de naves enemigas. Es necesario realizar un reconocimiento de inmediato para confirmar la situación de Vheabos-VI.

languages.text: Erste Scans belegen eine katastrophale Veränderung in der Atmosphäre des Planeten und die Zerstörung der Infrastruktur auf seiner Oberfläche. Außerdem wurden feindliche Schiffe geortet. Zur Ermittlung der Situation auf Vheabos VI ist eine sofortige Aufklärung erforderlich.
languages.original_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: Erste Scans belegen eine katastrophale Veränderung in der Atmosphäre des Planeten und die Zerstörung der Infrastruktur auf seiner Oberfläche. Außerdem wurden feindliche Schiffe geortet. Zur Ermittlung der Situation auf Vheabos-VI ist eine sofortige Aufklärung erforderlich.

languages.text: Les analyses préliminaires indiquent une modification très préoccupante de l'atmosphère de la planète et la destruction d'infrastructures à sa surface, ainsi que la présence de vaisseaux ennemis. Une expédition de reconnaissance doit être menée au plus vite pour évaluer la situation sur Vhéabos-VI.
languages.original_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: Les analyses préliminaires indiquent une modification très préoccupante de l'atmosphère de la planète et la destruction d'infrastructures à sa surface, ainsi que la présence de vaisseaux ennemis. Une expédition de reconnaissance doit être menée au plus vite pour évaluer la situation sur Vhéabos-VI.

languages.text: İlk taramalar, gezegenin atmosferinde son derece negatif bir değişim olduğunu ve yüzeydeki altyapı unsurlarında tahribat gerçekleştiğini gösteriyor. Buna ek olarak düşman gemileri tespit edildi. Vheabos VI'da neler olduğunu tam olarak anlayabilmek için bir an önce keşif gerçekleştirilmeli.
languages.original_text: Preliminary scanning revealed a catastrophic change in the planet's atmosphere and devastation of infrastructure on its surface, and it also detected the presence of enemy vessels. Reconnaissance must be carried out immediately to ascertain the situation on Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: İlk taramalar gezegenin atmosferinde son derece negatif bir değişim olduğunu ve yüzeydeki altyapıda tahribat gerçekleştiğini gösteriyor. Tespit edilen düşman gemileri de var. Vheabos VI'daki durumun ne olduğunu tam olarak anlayabilmek için bir an önce bir keşif gerçekleştirilmeli.
